DataElement.preferredName: Epidermis Genetic Testing Diagnostic Procedure Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date a dermal tape strip specimen was collected for genetic testing.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Epidermis Genetic Testing Diagnostic Procedure Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a diagnostic procedure (methods and/or tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability) using the epidermis (the epithelial portion of the skin) performed (carried out) for genetic testing (analyzing DNA to look for a genetic alteration that may indicate an increased risk for developing a specific disease or disorder).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The epithelial portion of the skin (cutis). It consists of the following layers: stratum corneum (horny layer), stratum granulosum (granular layer), stratum spinosum (prickle cell layer), and stratum basale (basal cell layer).:Analyzing DNA to look for a genetic alteration that may indicate an increased risk for developing a specific disease or disorder.:Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: The epithelial portion of the skin (cutis). It consists of the following layers: stratum corneum (horny layer), stratum granulosum (granular layer), stratum spinosum (prickle cell layer), and stratum basale (basal cell layer).
The process of isolating and testing the DNA of an embryo or a person to detect the presence of genetic alterations or defects that may predispose to the future development of a disease or disorder.
Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
